00040 #ifndef NORMALVECTOR_H
00041 #define NORMALVECTOR_H

00043 #include <iostream>
00044 struct Vector3D;
00045 
00046 struct NormalVector
00047 {
00048     NormalVector( double dx = 0.0, double dy = 0.0, double dz = 0.0 );
00049     explicit NormalVector( const Vector3D& vector );
00050     ~NormalVector( );
00051 
00052     NormalVector& operator+=( const NormalVector& nV);
00053     NormalVector& operator-=( const NormalVector& nV );
00054 
00055     NormalVector& operator*=( double scalar );
00056     NormalVector operator*( double scalar ) const;
00057     NormalVector& operator/=( double scalar );
00058     NormalVector operator/( double scalar ) const;
00059 
00060     NormalVector operator-() const;
00061 
00062     bool operator==( const NormalVector& nV ) const;
00063     bool operator!=( const NormalVector& nV ) const;
00064     double operator[]( int i ) const;
00065     double& operator[]( int i );
00066 
00067     double lengthSquared( ) const;
00068     double length( ) const;
00069 
00070     double x;
00071     double y;
00072     double z;
00073 };
00074 
00075 NormalVector operator+( NormalVector lhs, const NormalVector& rhs );
00076 NormalVector operator-( NormalVector lhs, const NormalVector& rhs );
